TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program - Enhanced Edition Update

Articles.Content:
14 minutes ago, Rutabaga22 said:

CUH-2015A

Mines CUH-1216b

On 11/24/2022 at 7:38 PM, uncle grim said:

Ps4 pro ssd 2tb. its the ONLY game that has any data corrupt issues.  I play build and rts games not one has corrupt data after a blue screen, some loss time for sure till last save.  But no corrupt. Also tried on other systems in the house same issues with data corruption.  So you can check its your system off.  Even on a 6mo out of the box ps4 pro.  Its a memory leak that is console specific. There are some cues I've noticed to Prior this happening suddenly pieces are missing from your build mid-flight just they're gone they were there when you took off then no explosion nothing on your flight list stating they were destroyed just gone then the game goes oh no there was something supposed to be there everything locks up blue screen go to reload the game and get a corrupted data warning.  Even if you catch that they're missing and you want to put it back on and revert flight doing that can cause a crash the majority of the time.  

@uncle grim can you send the model numbers of yours. Based on the info from Rutabaga I'd steer towards anything pre CUH-20xxx being the common similarity. Ideally need more ps4 players to tell us. Is it possible to do surveys through this forum?

6 minutes ago, Ande said:

Is it possible to do surveys through this forum

You can, you have to use polls on a post you made.

You can make thread asking for performance playing ksp and model number.
PS enhanced edition player experience poll https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/210857-ps-enhanced-edition-player-experience-poll/

Yeh... Just got to 46k from surface of eve... Blasting through... Sound of plasma levels getting insane... And then... Screen hangs... Sound continues... Welcome to another blue screen of death I've learnt that if you crash during this hanging, it's likely you can reload without the corruption.
[shouts into the night] HELLLLLLOOOOO...ANYBODY THERE??? @StarSlay3r... Anyone???

Hellooo! So I have been messing about with this on Series X today and keyboard controls seem very hot and miss. Can’t pan the camera around in building mode with mouse or keyboard or control a craft in flight. Is this pretty common or am I being a total numpty?

On 12/2/2022 at 9:11 PM, Randomist85 said:

Hellooo! So I have been messing about with this on Series X today and keyboard controls seem very hot and miss. Can’t pan the camera around in building mode with mouse or keyboard or control a craft in flight. Is this pretty common or am I being a total numpty? 

Games not been designed for keyboard use really so doesn't surprise me. I think it's pretty much just been done to help with naming things quickly. I just stick to console controller tbh
Safe to say this update is dead in the water at this point. RIP console users.

33 minutes ago, MechBFP said:

Safe to say this update is dead in the water at this point. RIP console users. 

I'd say the game was dead as soon as someone at Squad said "Hey, how well do you think KSP would play with a controller?". Dead on the drawing board
Theres at least one thing that the KSP team should do, and its just give console players free PC version as a last goodbye and then just shut down KSP EE.
Console players still can’t repair anything with engineers, which means anything damaged is a lost cause.

Every week Epic Games gives away a free game or two.  Next week they are giving away Kerbal Space Program.  So that is a chance to pick up the game for free.  https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/

Bl##dy hell... I shelled out for it on steam in a sale back when I first reported the issues but for a variety of reasons I still want to play the ps4 version.

1. It should work as intended!!!

2. I actually prefer using the console controls for in game flight ( not so much in VAB... ) 

3. My PC is a laptop that is put away and I CBA to go and get it every time I want to build a rocket. Ps4 is constantly out in the lounge. 

4. Having access to the mun launch pad

5. Collecting my ps trophies... 

6. Because I want to play on my ps4, and I bought it for my ps4 for a reason

Btw .. Direct link here... 

https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/kerbal-space-program

On 1/10/2023 at 4:16 PM, Aerodynamic Kerbal said:

Theres a bad thing about controllers. If you both rotate by any axis and zoom in/out the trim thing activates, which SUCKS. IT RUINS EVERY FLIGHT IN ITS PATH. And of course, there is no way to reset it.

Just turn it off in settings... That's what I did. Flight and building is so much more fun on console than PC... I've played both. PC is useful for all the random part clicks, but the keyboard controls are such a pain. If you had a controller on the PC that would be ace I reckon.
